promotion.code.label: Referral Code
promotion.howto_1y: If a friend shared their referral code with you, enter the code to receive one month of Lantern Pro for free after checkout.
promotion.howto_2y: If a friend shared their referral code with you, enter the code to receive three months of Lantern Pro for free after checkout.

promotion.promotion_applied_1y: Your Promo Code has been applied! You'll receive one extra months after check out
promotion.promotion_applied_2y: Your Promo Code has been applied! You'll receive three extra months after check out
promotion.too_many_referrals: This referral code has already been added. Check out now to receive your extra months.

status.off: Lantern is OFF. You can't access blocked sites.

verify.howto_1: If you have a Lantern Pro account on another device, please enter your e-mail address here to receive a code to authorize the device
verify.howto_1a: You're currently an unauthorized Pro user. Please enter your e-mail address to authorize your Pro account. This will enable you to link multiple devices.
verify.howto_2: Enter your mobile phone number to receive a verification code via SMS.
verify.howto_3: Lantern will never share your number with third parties.
verify.howto_4: Enter the verification code you received via email
verify.howto_5: Didn't receive a code? Please check your spam folder and make sure your email address is entered correctly above.
verify.title: Account Verification
welcomeToPro.invite: Invite friends and you will each get 3 months free when they purchase the two-year plan, the one year plan gets you each 1 month free. Start inviting!
welcomeToPro.thanks: Thanks for your purchase of Lantern Pro!
